Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Timestamp
Class.Description: The input string must first match "4N1X2N1X2N' '2N':'2N':'2N" -- the standard date-time or timestamp format. If the format matches then call the date and time validators. Return 1 (@true) if all three checks pass.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init(parameters) if attribute->hasErrors() then return attribute
value = attribute->value
if value matches "4N1X2N1X2N' '2N':'2N':'2N" then if "EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Date"->run(field(value, " ", 1)) then if "EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Time"->run(field(value, " ", 2)) then return attribute end end end
attribute->addError("Please enter a datetime value as YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS.") return attribute
